channel.title: Congrats The Soul
channel.description: I don't know if I should say congrats or good luck :| , I know that download section is going to be a bitch to mod, but still congrats.

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

ChaosPkers:

its about fucking time

Thanks, I am never getting it now.

[quote=“Si Force, post:36, topic:338378”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=434766.msg3193344#msg3193344 date=1272493737]
I have yet to see a staff member that did not have 200 rep before promotion.
[/quote]

One example at the moment is Archer, he has around 105 reputation points. It really doesn’t matter about rep, it doesn’t show anything.[/quote]

Yeah on Mopar it means nothing, if you go to MITB you will see rep has more of a meaning their since people don’t hand it out like candy.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:338378”][quote author=R3volution` link=topic=434766.msg3193217#msg3193217 date=1272487789]
Who cares about how many staff there are. As long as the boards are kept clean I could care less.
[/quote]
Him:[quote author=jmood128 link=topic=434766.msg3193186#msg3193186 date=1272485917]
Well lets think here, the RSC section has what 2 sectional mods?, Server help and downloads is now The Soul’s, then we have 3-4 regular mods (this was an estimate, I don’t look at the staff members ever day to see who’s on it). Do we need any more mods? (I should say “Do we really need more mods”).
[/quote][/quote]

If you read my sentence again, I asked a question after my sentence, also I think at the minute were fine for mods.

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Chassy13:

Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).

2nd funniest statement from a moderator I’ve ever seen!

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Oh great just what our moderating team needs is another newfag…

APRIL FOOLS (WUT…? lol)

Just kidding the soul, welcome to the team

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:33, topic:338378”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=434766.msg3193335#msg3193335 date=1272493109]
Well, I might as well answer a few debates here…

Not all the moderators are regular moderators. Some of them are inactive, which is their choice/they cannot help it. Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).

Personally I don’t think they even count people that have less then 200 rep.

Incorrect. Other staff members and myself all know that reputation is worthless here. The only consideration is MoparScape Vet. The Soul wasn’t even a Vet when he was promoted.
[/quote]I have yet to see a staff member that did not have 200 rep before promotion, and there are many qualified people that have been around for a while (06-07) and don’t have 200 rep, and they never even get mentioned.

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=434766.msg3193335#msg3193335 date=1272493109]
Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).
[/quote]Did any of the staff members PM an admin and get promoted?[/quote]

I didn’t have any rep on moparscape until I became a mod.

And asking for a moderator position pretty much guarantees you’ll never get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

ChaosPkers:

its about fucking time

You’re aware that having the promotion of members in your signature is more likely to never get them recommended/nominated? We have to many mods atm now also, so a couple people would have to resign before anyones mentioned. IMO the moderation base we have now seems solid for the time being.

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:34, topic:338378”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=434766.msg3193344#msg3193344 date=1272493737]
Did any of the staff members PM an admin and get promoted?
[/quote]

No. If you didn’t understand what I meant, here would be an example:

“Hi, can I moderate MoparScape? I’m interested in the job.”

You’d be denied immediately and never mentioned on future lists most likely.

The highest things we look for in moderators is number of reported topics, maturity, their past, and activity on the boards.[/quote]Yeah, there are two different meanings of ‘volunteer’, I didn’t know which you meant.

He volunteered for the job
He was asked to volunteer

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Davidi2:

Did any of the staff members PM an admin and get promoted?

No. If you didn’t understand what I meant, here would be an example:

“Hi, can I moderate MoparScape? I’m interested in the job.”

You’d be denied immediately and never mentioned on future lists most likely.

The highest things we look for in moderators is number of reported topics, maturity, their past, and activity on the boards.

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:32, topic:338378”]Well, I might as well answer a few debates here…

Not all the moderators are regular moderators. Some of them are inactive, which is their choice/they cannot help it. Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).

Personally I don’t think they even count people that have less then 200 rep.

Incorrect. Other staff members and myself all know that reputation is worthless here. The only consideration is MoparScape Vet. The Soul wasn’t even a Vet when he was promoted.[/quote]I have yet to see a staff member that did not have 200 rep before promotion, and there are many qualified people that have been around for a while (06-07) and don’t have 200 rep, and they never even get mentioned.

[quote=“Chassy13, post:32, topic:338378”]Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).[/quote]Did any of the staff members PM an admin and get promoted?

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats The Soul
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, I might as well answer a few debates here…

Not all the moderators are regular moderators. Some of them are inactive, which is their choice/they cannot help it. Moderating is a volunteer job (not meaning you can just PM an admin and say I WANNA DO IT YO).

Davidi2:

Personally I don’t think they even count people that have less then 200 rep.

Incorrect. Other staff members and myself all know that reputation is worthless here. The only consideration is MoparScape Vet. The Soul wasn’t even a Vet when he was promoted.

Moderating this site is harder than you know. We deal with dozens of punishments, bans, reports, etc. everyday. There is really nothing to be jealous about, even though that sexy bulbasaur could be a reason.

Read full topic
